title: Visual Learning of Managerial Accounting Using an Integrated Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic accounting terminology (cost, revenue, budget, etc.) and ability to perform simple financial calculations
context.additional_context: Case-based integrated framework designed to increase workplace applicability for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can perform cost-volume-profit (CVP) analysis using the 'Bridge' calculation method within the integrated framework
Learners can connect and visualize various managerial accounting concepts (budgeting, variance analysis) using a single graph and formula
Learners achieve over 80% applicability of core concepts to workplace scenarios through formative assessments (quizzes, simulations)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
